code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{getResources}from"../../store/actions";import styles from"./Resources.module.css";var Resources=function Resources(props){var resources=useSelector(function(state){return state.resources.resources;});var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){dispatch(getResources());},[dispatch]);var resourceList=resources.length>0?resources.map(function(resource){return React.createElement("li",null,React.createElement("a",{href:resource.url},resource.title),": ",resource.description);}):"No resources have been added yet.";return React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,React.createElement("h3",null,"Resources"),React.createElement("div",{className:styles.Resources},React.createElement("ul",null,resourceList)));};export default Resources;
